channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft’s Update Decision—Google Disappears On PCs, Androids, iPhones
item.description: Google slams Microsoft for sudden new update—here’s what you need to know.

item.title: UFC Parts Ways With Two Huge Fan-Favorite Fighters
item.description: The UFC roster is transitioning and many of the fan-favorite fighters are retiring or being released. The UFC parted ways with 2 legends recently.

item.title: Former UFC Champ Slams GFL ‘Made Promises They Can’t Possibly Keep’
item.description: The GFL held their inaugural draft on Friday, but there were fighters included who may not have signed off on their inclusion.

item.title: BKFC Knucklemania 5 Results: KO Highlights And Reactions
item.description: When the spotlight was brightest, Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship delivered arguably its best show ever in Philadelphia on Saturday night.
